parameters.name: GIpList
parameters.description:
The IP addresses in the whitelist template.

> Separate multiple IP addresses with commas (,). You can create up to 1,000 IP addresses or CIDR blocks for all IP address whitelists.

parameters.name: GlobalIgName
parameters.description: The name of the IP whitelist template.

parameters.name: GlobalSecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the IP whitelist template.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
